mapper.select: select DISTINCT(product_category) from comic_productstock where product_category not in(SELECT a.product_category FROM COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK a, COMIC_ORDERVIEW b where a.product_category = b.orderview_category)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(PRODUCT_NUM),0)+1 FROM COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK),#{product_name},#{product_price},#{product_qty},#{product_category})
mapper.select: select * from COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK where product_category=#{product_category} and product_num not in (select orderview_product_num from COMIC_ORDERVIEW_PRODUCT)
